document.title: TNH-6001-Evaluating Conformation of Horses

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Conformation is important to all breeds and types of horses because of its relationship to performance. The well-conformed horse will be a superior athlete. The competent horse judge or evaluator will recognize the differences between individuals and select the more desirably conformed horse. The information in this fact sheet will serve as a tool for a student of horse evaluation to improve his or her evaluation skills.
